newsitem.title: INDIA: India SBI board to meet Nov 28, results.
newsitem.headline: India SBI board to meet Nov 28, results.

text.p: India's state-run State Bank of India (SBI) has called a meeting of its board on November 28 to finalise results for the six months to September 30, 1996, the firm said in a notice to the Bombay Stock Exchange on Friday.
The bank made a net profit of 2.3 billion rupees on a total income of 62.52 billion in the same period a year ago.

A Reuter poll of 14 leading securities firms in September forecast SBI's average net profit to leap 178 percent to 6.39 billion rupees in the first half of 1996/97 (April-March) on income of 76.6 billion rupees.
